name: Péint
description:
Peint is a watercolor storybook style side-scroller where the player ventures with their color shifting fox to paint life back into the world and see the northern lights.

Control Methods:

  • Android mobile devices: tap left half of the screen to change color, tap right half of the screen to jump, holding longer on right half screen makes higher jump.
  • Windows PCs: press left control/left mouse button to change color, press space bar to jump, holding longer on space bar makes higher jump.

Programmer: Yixuan Wei

Artist: Dana Brooks

Level Designers: Alex Vaughn & Courtney Leonie

Audio Designer: Alex Vaughn
